response: NSFAS is the National Student Financial Aid Scheme.  We provide funding for students from poor and working-class backgrounds to study at universities and TVET colleges in South Africa.
The National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) was established in 1999.  It aims to provide financial assistance to deserving students.
